title: File a Corporate Annual Report
description: A corporate paralegal needs to file a company's annual report with the Secretary of State to keep it in good standing.

tasks.description: Identify the deadline for filing the annual report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct filing deadline.

tasks.description: Gather the required information, such as the names of current directors and officers.
Complete and file the annual report form through the Secretary of State's online portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The annual report is successfully filed.
